hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jami' bin Shaddad said:"I heard Humran bin Aban tell Abu Burdah in the Masjid that he heard 'Uthman narrating that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever performs Wudu' completely as commanded by Allah, the five daily prayers will be an expiation for whatever comes in between them

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ تَوَضَّأَ كَمَا أُمِرَ
chapter.eng-name: The Reward For The One Who Performs Wudu' As Commanded
